content:
The Ministry of Veterans Affairs provided clarification as to who has the right to be buried at the National Military Memorial Cemetery (NVMC).

About thisIt is saidOn the website of the department.

Yes, part one of Article 15-1The Law of Ukraine “On Burial and Funeral Affairs”definedexhaustiveThe list of persons who have the right to be buried in the National Military Memorial Cemetery. Namely:

Military:

  • which defended the independence, sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine,
  • Full Cavaliers of the Order of Bohdan Khmelnitsky, the Order of Courage, Order of Princess Olga,
  • which, participated in international peace and security operations,
  • Heroes of Ukraine, who have been presented with the Order of the Golden Star since 2014.

War veterans:

  • Participants in hostilities: ATO, OOS, large -scale invasion of Russia,
  • Persons with disabilities as a result of war: ATO, OOS, large -scale invasion of Russia.

“We also inform, entry into forceThe Law of Ukraine of 08.12.2023 No. 3505-IX"On Amendments to Certain Legislative Acts of Ukraine on Ensuring the Construction and Operation of the National Military Memorial Cemetery" was given the opportunity not only to be re-enrolling not only the Heroes of Ukraine from among the persons listed in part one of Article 15-1 of the Law of Ukraine "On burial and funeral", but also persons,buried in temporarily occupied territories, ” -noted in the department.

In addition, the NVMC can be carried outreburial outstanding fighters for Ukraine's independenceIn the XX century. As well as persons who have the right to be buried at the NVMC whose ashes are buried in a Columbar niche in other cemeteries, they can be reburied in Columbaria at the National Metropolitan Cemetery in accordance with the procedure approved by the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine.

It should be reminded that on March 15, the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine at a meeting approved an order to determine the location of the National Military Memorial Cemetery in the Gatnensky Village Territorial Community of Fastiv District of Kyiv Region.
